# mittwald_ai_api_key (Resource)

This resource manages an AI API key for the mittwald AI hosting service.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "mittwald_ai_api_key" "example" {
  customer_id = var.customer_id
  name        = "my-api-key"
}
```

```terraform
resource "mittwald_ai_api_key" "example_for_project" {
  project_id = mittwald_project.example.id
  name       = "my-project-api-key"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the API key.

### Optional

- `customer_id` (String) The ID of the customer to create the API key for. Either `customer_id` or `project_id` must be set.
- `project_id` (String) The ID of the project to create the API key for. Either `customer_id` or `project_id` must be set.

### Read-Only

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) The generated API key value. This is only available after creation and is sensitive.
- `id` (String) The generated API key ID.
